$$
\lambda_i(t \ | \ X_i, k, \delta) = \sum_{l = 1}^{L}\gamma_l \mathrm{M}_l(t \ | \ k, \delta)\ast \mathrm{exp}(\beta \cdot X_i)
$$

$$
\beta = (\beta_0 + \beta_1 + ... + \beta_n) 
$$

$$
X_i = (1 + x_1 + ... + x_n) 
$$
